## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                           | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `error`  | `error`   | Displays error(s) below the input     | `string \| string[]`  | `''`        |
| `label`  | `label`   | Label to display above the select box | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
